item.title: Hard Disk Information
item.description: smartctl lshw lsblk blkid hdparm fdisk with grep smartctl sudo smartctl -i /dev/sdx lshw Note The tool lshw provides detail information on the hardware configuration of the machine. Additional flags (ie class) can be used to filter output. sudo lshw -short -class disk sudo lshw -short -class disk -class storage lsblk lsblk /dev/sdx blkid blkid hdparm sudo hdparm -I /dev/sda fdisk with grep fdisk -l | grep '^Disk /dev/' fdisk -l | grep '^Disk /dev/' | egrep -v '/dev/(loop|mapper|md)'
